PREAMBLE:
Week #WEEK_NUM# takes us to the 2007 version of Daytona International Speedway, on the challenging Bike layout. This is probably one of the most technical free content track layouts on the service, and really rewards diligent practice and clean driving.

TRACK_NOTES:
The draft around the oval section is HUGE. SRF draft extends to almost 1.5 seconds behind the car, so you will have a great opportunity to pass here. Please be patient and avoid spoiling the race for yourself and others by attempting passes in bad spots! 

In particular, the entrance to T1 can be [b]very [/b]tricky due to the angle of the braking zone coming down off the banking. Take extra care going side-by-side into this corner. 

See the video above for more info.
